attributes.action: Create an education standard of horticulture and enviromental qualifications in all schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to add to the GSCE qualification of a horticultural qualification early on.
This would include all schools from entry level to GSCe before exploring a degree and further of having a garden teacher and allotment in each school would teach children how to grow and care for their enviroment in enjoyment and better understanding of our enviroment, the horticulture industry has a very strong base in the UK and to add growing food and plants as a seperate science and horticultual qualification that would drive our generations to be more involved in food, farming and the enviroment and would be very beneficial to our culture, enviroment and future of our genarations and an example to other countries

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
